content.raw:
I don’t know how to reopen this issue, so I will try commenting here. After analyzing the `PointCloud2` data, I found many `-INFINITY` points, which were significantly farther away from the camera than valid points - see red dots on the mesh below \(camera is represented by a white dot, beige mesh illustrates valid measurements\): 

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8ze6Mjd/images/295215645-negInf.png)
‌
